site.title: Instabart
taglines: All of NTNU gathered under one site!
Covers all your needs as an NTNU student... except coffee
Let the site pave the way through NTNU's lush IT jungle!
NTNU's IT services? Gotta know 'em all!
You and me, NTNU. You and me...
All the links you need... and a couple more
Don't get lost without the site!

whatIs.title: What is Instabart?
whatIs.description1: Instabart is a site for you who are a student in Trondheim.
whatIs.description2: The site contains direct links to various NTNU services. Some you'll need daily, others will come in handy once in a while - we recommend that you check out all of them.

whoMade.title: Who's behind the site?
whoMade.description: Instabart is made by {authorLink}. In short, Morten is a former NTNU student, pun enthusiast and completely unable to grow a proper beard... ironically enough.

feedback.title: Something bothering you?
feedback.description: Got something on your mind? Send an email to {emailLink} or {githubLink}.

links.author: Morten Vaale Noddeland
links.github: check out the code on Github

dialog.title: Remember calendar name?
dialog.description: By remembering your calendar name, you'll be taken straight to your own schedule instead of the front page.
dialog.decline: No, take me to the front page
dialog.help: Psst! If you change your mind, you can always change your choice by clicking on {settingsIcon} settings at the bottom right.
